lead_paragraph: Organizers of the 2016 Paralympic Games are giving away half a million tickets 100 days before the start of competition in a bid to boost support for September's events, officials said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Rio Giving Away 500,000 Paralympics Tickets to Boost Support
headline.main: Rio Giving Away 500,000 Paralympics Tickets to Boost Support
